title: Future of on-premise data management w/ DataStax Enterprise 6.9 & Hyper-Converged Data Platform
description:
Powered by Restream https://restream.io

Data is the cornerstone of innovation and competitive advantage in today's fast-paced digital landscape. Join us for an insightful webinar where we delve into the transformative capabilities of DataStax Enterprise 6.9 and the groundbreaking DataStax Hyper-Converged Data Platform.

Discover how DataStax Enterprise (DSE) 6.9 enhances the performance, scalability, and security of enterprise AI workloads and real-time data processing. Learn about the new features and improvements that make it easier to manage complex data environments while ensuring high availability and fault tolerance.

We will also introduce the DataStax Hyper-Converged Data Platform (HCDP), a unified solution that seamlessly integrates multiple data models and workloads within a single platform. This innovation simplifies architecture, reduces operational costs, and accelerates time-to-value for all of your data initiatives.

Key Takeaways:
--Comprehensive overview of DSE 6.9's new features and enhancements.
--Insight into the benefits of the HCDP for modern data management.
--Learn why you should upgrade to DSE 6.9 and/or HCDP.
--Discover how to drive business value from the generative AI and vector search capabilities of DSE 6.9 and HCDP.

Don't miss this opportunity to stay ahead of the curve in generative AI data management technology. Upgrade to DataStax Enterprise 6.9 and embrace the future with the Hyper Converged Database Platform. Secure your spot today and unlock the full potential of your data assets, ensuring you aren’t left behind in this rapidly evolving field!

About DataStax Developer:
On the DataStax Developers YouTube channel, you can find tutorials, workshops and much more to help you learn and stay updated with the latest information on Apache Cassandra©.  Visit https://datastax.com/dev for more free learning resources.
